俷字的基本解释

俷
fèi
背弃；败坏：“毋俷德。”

俷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fèi］
［《集韻》父沸切，去未，奉。］
背弃，败坏。参见“俷德”。

俷字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　俷； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页106第18
【集韻】父沸切，音奜。敗也，背也。【史記·三王世家】燕王策曰：無作怨，無俷德。【註】索隱曰：勿使王背德也。俷與偝背倍北悖?通。

俷字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
俷字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Pay
fèi
Betrayal; corruption: "No virtue."
Pay
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fèi］
["Jiyun" father is boiling and cutting, Quwei, Feng. ]
Betrayal and corrupt. See "Faith".
Pay
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　俷; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 106 Page 18
[Jiyun] Father boiling and cutting, sound is humongous. If you fail, you can back it. [Historical Records: Family of Three Kings] Yan Wang's policy said: No grievances, no moral virtues. [Note] Suo Yin said: Don't make Wang bear virtue. Fa and Kai Pei Beibei Beiwei? Tong.
